text: Paul Eddington CBE (18 June 1927 - 4 November 1995) was a British actor. He was born in Paddington, London. He is best known for his roles as Jerry Leadbetter in The Good Life and Jim Hacker in Yes Minister. He died of skin cancer in Southwark, London. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from London Category:Cancer deaths in London Category:Deaths from skin cancer Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1927 births Category:1995 deaths
title: Paul Eddington
